title: Rupert Murdoch Makes A Play For Time Warner
teaser: The $80 billion takeover bid from Murdoch's 21st Century Fox was rebuffed, but that may not stop the media magnate's advances.
contentencoded:
Rupert Murdoch is at it again, attempting to bolster his media empire with another merger. This time, it’s Time Warner that 21st Century Fox is after, offering $80 billion in a takeover bid that was ultimately rebuffed.

But this may not be the only offer from Murdoch, who is known in the industry for both his bold deals and his persistence.

NPR’s David Folkenflik joins Here & Now’s Meghna Chakrabarti to discuss whether a Time Warner and 21st Century Fox merger is likely, and what it would mean.
